messages.message:
Hey, seeing a lot of missing confidence scores in this (https://nab.internal.instabase.com/build/0196cd43-ba7b-7672-a44f-5bd35603ca36) POV solution. Every reasoning extraction (standard or advanced) seems to have a confidence score that is 'unknown'? Could this be due to being an Australia sandbox and the Azure endpoint we are using?

cc @jordy.vlan @Shridhar Kawalkar @Sankeerthana
Visual reasoning and text extraction look fine
Yeah likely related to poor parsing of confidence estimation object with multiple yes/no that need to be extracted, which goes wrong with older GPT models.
@jordy.vlan so this is not a bug or a problem just a solution design consideration?
Is the solution to use extraction/reasoning -> followed by cleaning instead
yes that would make sense to me!
Jup Jup Jup; when we revisit confidence estimation we plan on making those methods more robust and define fallbacks if need be. ;)
^ @Sankeerthana @Shridhar Kawalkar worth considering re-structuring the prompts accordingly :slightly_smiling_face:
